title: Maasila unmai Kadhale Lyrics Alibabavum 40 Thirudargalum
stanzas:
Maasila unmai Kadhale Lyrics From Alibabavum 40 Thirudargalum
Singers: AM Rajah, P Bhanumathi

Maasila unmai kadhale
Maarumo selvam
Vandha podhile

Pesum vaarthai
Unmai thaanaa
Pedaiyai eikka 
Neengal podum
Vesama ?

Kannile minnum
Kadhale 
Kandumaa sandhegam
Endhan meedhile

Nenjile neengidaadhu
Konjum inbamey.
Nilaikkumaa indha
Endha naalumey.

Pesum vaarthai
Unmai thaanaa
Pedaiyai eikka 
Neengal podum
Vesama ?

Maasila unmai kadhale
Maarumaa? selvam
Vandha podhile

Kannile minnum
Kadhale 
Kandumaa sandhegam
Endhan meedhile

Unadhu roobamey
Ullam thannil vaaludhe
Iniya sollinaal
Enadhu ullam 
Magizhudhe.

Anbinaale 
Ondru serndhom.
Ingu naam 
Inbamaai innum ellai
Kaanuvom .

Maasila unmai kadhale
Maarumo selvam
Vandha podhile.
